Comments_List: A great new knowledge about the 1960s in Latin America, theoretical tools to understand questions in this context. Through the reading list, I discovered great texts that are helpful for my future career.

A wonderful instructor and an excellent TA present a historic and theoretical panorama in a comprehensible way and invite to engage in intensive discussions. I would recommend this course for everyone!

Yes, because this course is a jewel regarding the supervision by the instructor and TA! It helps to apprehend the movement of the 1960s, invites to read texts in original languages and to open the theoretical horizon.
